A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that Congress should reject any proposal for the creation of a system of global taxation and regulation.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of the Senate that Congress should reject any proposal for the creation of: (1) an international system of government bailouts for the financial sector; (2) a global cap-and-trade system or other climate regulations that would punish businesses in the United States and limit the competitiveness of the United States; and (3) a global tax system that would violate U.S. sovereignty.
